Name: Singing Majalis
Desc: A marvelous plant entrusted to you by an Aranara song gatherer in Vanarana.\nAccording to Arakavi, this type of flower should have died out in the disaster a long time ago.\nHowever, the time of a seed is stagnant. Just like the dormant seeds of Aranara can be awoken under the nourishment of memories, this plant, bathing in the light you have brought to Vanarana and listening to the song from Festival Utsava, bloomed again.
